title: Spicy chicken coconut curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '4 chicken breast fillets, cut into bite size pieces', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2cm piece fresh root ginger, grated', '250g (8 oz) tomatoes, chopped', '2 teaspoons poppy seeds', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon mild curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 pinch chilli powder (optional)', '300ml (1/2 pt) chicken stock', '75g (3 oz) coconut milk or cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons natural Greek yoghurt', 'chopped fresh coriander, to garnish']
